column4: Uncategorized;Phnom Penh: A Phnom Penh Municipal Court judge decided to keep a Chinese man in pre-trial detention on 05 December 2018. The suspect will be held in Prey Sar prison on charges of intentional violence
column5: which is punishable under the provisions of Article 218 of the Penal Code.------The ------incident happened------ around 2 pm ------on ------December 1 ------
column10: attacked a sugarcane seller and a police officer before attempting to commit suicide in the street.
